short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prepend a mention to each tweet

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Twitter Bias Warning" Chrome extension serves as a gentle reminder to tread carefully in the realm of ideas. With every tweet you encounter, a vintage-styled caution, "Beware of sophism & cognitive bias", is prepended, prompting users to critically evaluate content and be wary of misleading rhetoric. Drawing inspiration from the ancient Greek sophists, this extension encourages modern-day thinkers to cultivate an analytical mindset amidst the vast digital agora of Twitter.
